name: Etoile Theme Companion
author: Etoile Web Design

sections.description:
Companion plugin for themes from Etoile Web Design, such as the Ultimate Showcase theme.

No support will given for this plugin. All support will be handled via the theme.
sections.changelog:
1.5

  • Added conditional checks for upcoming theme release

1.4

  • Added functionality for the jump boxes and testimonials number of columns select in the the Keep Calm and E-Comm theme

1.3

  • Added in the ability to use WooCommerce products in the featured products area on the homepage

1.2

  • Fixed issue with front-end JS enqueing in the admin instead

1.1

  • Updated enqueueing of JS anc CSS files.
  • Updated text domain.
  • Added in a text localization.

1.0

  • Initial version.
